entry.name: icon
entry.label: The name of the icon to use for the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: useCustomButtonImage
entry.label: Whether to use a custom image instead of an icon in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: customButtonImage
entry.label: The URL of the custom image to use instead of an icon in the compact representation (e.g. on a small panel).

entry.name: appIconSize
entry.label: The size of the icons in the applications grid

entry.name: maxNumberColumns
entry.label: The max number of columns in the applications grid

entry.name: useDirectoryIcons
entry.label: Determines whether directories should be displayed by their icon rather than a collection of their contents

entry.name: backgroundType
entry.label: The type of background to use

choice.name: theme
choice.label: The default background color set by the current Plasma theme

choice.name: custom
choice.label: A custom color set by the customBackgroundColor property

choice.name: image
choice.label: A custom image set by the customBackgroundImagePath property

entry.name: customBackgroundColor
entry.label: The custom color to use for the background when backgroundType is in custom mode

entry.name: customBackgroundImagePath
entry.label: The custom image path to use for the background when backgroundType is in image mode

entry.name: backgroundOpacity
entry.label: The opacity of the background in the fullscreen menu representation

entry.name: showSystemActions
entry.label: Determines whether or not the system actions are displayed

entry.name: showSystemActionLabels
entry.label: Determines whether or not the system actions will be displayed with labels

entry.name: useSymbolicSystemActionIcons
entry.label: Determines whether or not the system action icons attempt to use their symbolic representations

entry.name: systemActionIconSize
entry.label: The size of the system action icons (if displayed)

entry.name: appNameFormat
entry.label: The format used in the display of application names: 0 = NameOnly, 1 = GenericNameOnly, 2 = NameAndGenericName, 3 = GenericNameAndName

entry.name: favoriteSystemActions
entry.label: List of system action favorites.

entry.name: hiddenApplications
entry.label: List of menu id's (usually .desktop file names) of apps that should not be shown in the menu.

entry.name: showSearch
entry.label: Determines whether or not the search bar is displayed

entry.name: searchIconSize
entry.label: The size of the icons in the search results list. If adaptiveSearchIconSize is true, this value specifies the max value.

entry.name: adaptiveSearchIconSize
entry.label: Determines whether the icons in the search results list should be shrunk to match their native resolution.

entry.name: searchRunners
entry.label: List of KRunner plugin IDs to use in search

entry.name: disableAnimations
entry.label: Disables animations for app grid navigation and search results

entry.name: animationSpeedMultiplier
entry.label: A multiplier which can be used to adjust the speeds of all animations

entry.name: favoritesPortedToKAstats
entry.label: Whether the favorites are ported to use KActivitiesStats to allow per-activity favorites
